content.rendered:
Schedule Calendly Appointment

Schedule an appointment to chat with me via my Calendly. You and I can meet virtually to talk Salesforce. I love talking about the platform, answering questions, and helping others whenever I can with Salesforce. If it wasn’t for those that helped me, I would never have learned as much as I have, and therefore I believe in paying back the favor by passing on help.

If you are stuck with a problem, need help, want to talk about Sales, Service, Communities, solutioning, deployments, identity, sharing, best practices, tips and tricks, gotchas, flows, automation, apex vs declarative, what can LWCs do, flow actions, screen components, or anything else Salesforce, I’d love to talk with you, Just book an appointment below, and we can talk.

Links

Also, don’t forget to check out my User Group, Podcast, upcoming events, the local events in your area, and other opportunities to become involved in Salesforce. Salesforce isn’t just a platform, it’s a community and an Ohana, connected online and in person.

Salesforce Events

My Podcast – System dot Debug

My Calendar

#OhanaSlack, what is it and how to become a member here

My User Group – Access upcoming events and past events here

excerpt.rendered: Schedule an appointment to chat with me.
